wikipedia_page.main: Richard Kenneth Finney (10 March 1929 - 7 July 2018) is an English footballer who played as winger for Stockport County and Tranmere Rovers. Finney ended his career with Altrincham, where he was described as "a very likeable character who delights in poaching a goal".
